seo: ShowDoc,任意文件上传漏洞,PageController.class.php,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测ShowDoc应用中的PageController.class.php任意文件上传漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求来验证是否存在该漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in ShowDoc's PageController.class.php. It verifies the existence of the vulnerability by sending specific HTTP requests.
